localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: REDDIT TAKES DOWN IMMENSELY POPULAR WALLSTREETBETS *
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

previous.excerpt: I realized we don't have a lot of tools for a conversation-first culture. So, I deleted social media off of my phone and built this app. Whenever I am craving connection, I have it populate a random contact for me to text or call.
previous.title: Out of the Blue - A roulette for your contacts

localize.description: 我意识到我们没有很多工具来实现对话优先的文化。于是，我从手机上删除了社交媒体，并建立了这个应用。每当我渴望联系的时候，我就会让它随机弹出一个联系人，让我发短信或打电话。
localize.tagline: 为您的联系人提供轮盘赌

localize.description: 我意識到我們沒有很多工具來實現對話優先的文化。於是，我從手機上刪除了社交媒體，並建立了這個應用。每當我渴望聯繫的時候，我就會讓它隨機彈出一個聯繫人，讓我發短信或打電話。
localize.tagline: 爲您的聯繫人提供輪盤賭

next.excerpt: Fluid is a simple & fun water tracking app that allows you to easily track how much you drink each day. To help you stay motivated, you can connect with your friends to see each other's daily progress.
next.title: Fluid - Track water and stay healthy with your friends

localize.description: Fluid是一款简单有趣的水追踪应用，让你轻松追踪你每天喝多少水。为了帮助你保持动力，你可以与你的朋友连接，以查看对方的每日进度。
localize.tagline: 追踪水，和你的朋友一起保持健康

localize.description: Fluid是一款簡單有趣的水追蹤應用，讓你輕鬆追蹤你每天喝多少水。爲了幫助你保持動力，你可以與你的朋友連接，以查看對方的每日進度。
localize.tagline: 追蹤水，和你的朋友一起保持健康
